explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between corporate innovation and corporate investment, examining factors such as uncertainty, financial constraints, executives' risk preference, and firm risk-taking ability. The methodologies used include fixed effect regression models and system generalized methods of moments within a panel data framework. There is no mention or implication of any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related concepts in the title or abstract. The study is purely econometric and does not involve any of the listed keywords related to machine learning or artificial intelligence.
